title: Bill Maher Wants To 'Make America Learn Again' This Valentine's Day
text:
Bill Maher Wants To 'Make America Learn Again' This Valentine's Day "We don’t seem to want smart people in our lives any more." 02/11/2017 05:13 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Bill Maher wants just one thing this Valentine’s Day . And that’s to “Make America Learn Again.” On Friday’s broadcast of “ Real Time ,” Maher said “one of the saddest things” about the America that people now live in is that “we don’t seem to want smart people in our lives any more.” “Smart presidents? Can’t have that. Scientists? What do they know? Newspaper editors? Liars, fake news!” he quipped. Claiming that more people now get their news from their Facebook feeds “by sharing, or as it used to be called, hearsay” than newspapers, Maher asked whether “this Valentine’s Day, can we please fall in love with knowledge again?”
